definition.name: Frostfangs
specialInfo: §8§oCarrying elemental power of the ancient ice, the first hit with this dagger §b§oFreezes§8§o a target for a short periodt. While §b§oFrozen§8§o, your next attack will inflict §6§oFocus Blade§8§o bonus damage.
§8§oFocus blade deals bonus on hit damage based on your base §6AD§8§o(+ your bonus §5MD§8§o + §8§oyour bonus §6§oAD§8§o * 0,5) until a maximum of 5.
§8§o(Frozen targets suffer 5 additional damage when the ice is broken)
